qna.What do you mean by reversible change?: Changes that can be reversed are called reversible change.

qna.How does light travel?: Light travels as a wave in a straight line.

qna.What do you mean by algorithm?: An algorithm is a finite sequence of well-defined instructions, typically used to solve a class of specific problems or to perform a computation.

Every action (force) has equal and opposite reaction.

qna.Why is the sky blue in colour?: The blue colour is scattered more and reason for more scattering of blue colour is that the wavelength of the blue light is shorter than the other light.
